Package com.mygdx.game.Components

Class Pirate

java.lang.Object
com.mygdx.game.Components.Component
com.mygdx.game.Components.Pirate
public class Pirate
extends Component
Gives the concepts of health plunder, etc. Allows for firing of cannonballs, factions, death, targets
